headline.print_headline: Taking the Lead in the Family Business
headline.main: Lesa France Kennedy of Nascar on Taking the Lead in a Family Business

snippet: Ms. Kennedy, chief executive of the International Speedway Corporation and vice chairwoman of Nascar, knew that in order to climb the ranks, she’d have to earn “the invitation.” (With video.)
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Lesa France Kennedy, chief executive of International Speedway Corporation and vice chairwoman of Nascar, who discusses her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Kennedy, chief executive of the International Speedway Corporation and vice chairwoman of Nascar, knew that in order to climb the ranks, she’d have to earn “the invitation.” (With video.)
